roleset.name: use a cannula agin, or re-insert a tube

role.descr: Entity tube or cannula is reinserted into

example.name: recannulate-v
example.text: After weaning from CPB, [the right atrium]-1 was recannulated *-1 with a two-stage, dual-lumen cannula which was connected to an HRD via extracorporeal circulation.
example.arg: with a two-stage, dual-lumen cannula which was connected to an HRD via extracorporeal circulation
